display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 142px; height: 1px; padding-top: 640px; margin-left: 85px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: 负载均衡,对外提供单一用户端登录地址.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 172px; height: 1px; padding-top: 640px; margin-left: 255px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: 负责用户端登录，服务器数量不受限制，由Nginx统一管理.多个UserCenter可以部署在同一台物理服务器，需要在不同目录下启动

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 222px; height: 1px; padding-top: 640px; margin-left: 465px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: 消息路由服务器，接受各个UserCenter的RPC连接，并将UserCenter的消息转发到指定的UserCenter，一般用于传输踢人、在其他终端登录等消息,可以支持文本消息

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 222px; height: 1px; padding-top: 640px; margin-left: 715px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: 工程师专用服务器，只有一台，不需要负载均衡。每个UserCenter均需要主动与UserCenter建立RPC连接，否则无法与工程师通讯

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 222px; height: 1px; padding-top: 640px; margin-left: 965px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: 负责记录用户和工程师的登录信息，并且保存实时在线信息。redis中记录了用户和工程师从多个终端登录的信息

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 222px; height: 1px; padding-top: 640px; margin-left: 1215px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: 负责记录工程师的上下线记录，登录时长等信息

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 461px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 30px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1228px; height: 1px; padding-top: 810px; margin-left: 82px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
系统维护：通过命令行(--cmd=quit)将指定的UserCenter正常退出即可，退出时会清空与此服务器相关的在线状态。不要直接杀掉进程，否则redis不会得到正确的清理
系统扩容：扩容的时候只需要部署一台新服务器，并加入Nginx即可，与其他服务器无关

switch.text: 系统维护：通过命令行(--cmd=quit)将指定的UserCenter正常退出即可，退出时会清空与此服务器相关的在线状态。不要直接杀掉进程，否则redis不会得到正确的清理...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 344px; margin-left: 941px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 450px; margin-left: 581px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 395px; margin-left: 912px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: 每个UserCenter均与ServiceCenter直接建立RPC连接

switch.text: 每个UserCenter均与ServiceCenter直接建立RPC连接

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 364px; margin-left: 722px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: 每个UserCenter均与Message Router直接建立RPC连接

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
